trans-unit.source: Represents an exception used to communicate task cancellation.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个用于告知任务取消的异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException.Task" /> property is thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException.Task" />属性是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用由系统提供的用来描述错误的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将新实例的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 属性初始化为系统提供的错误描述消息。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>:
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.OperationCanceledException>:

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的描述错误的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: A task that has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 已取消的任务。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 使用对已取消的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 的引用初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=248602).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=248602)。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the task associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此异常关联的任务。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that is associated with this exception.
trans-unit.target: 对与此异常关联的 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: It is permissible for no Task to be associated with a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>, in which case this property will return null.
trans-unit.target: 为要与之关联的任务允许<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCanceledException>，在这种情况下，此属性将返回 null。

trans-unit.source: This property is thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。
